author: Emily Chung
title: The riskiest surfaces for coronavirus and how to clean them
description: Worried about catching the novel coronavirus by touching the wrong thing? Here’s what we know about which surfaces are worst, which ones are safer, and how to clean them.
content:
The recent news may have you worried about catching the novel coronavirus by touching the wrong thing.
Playgrounds have been closed across Canada to prevent transmission among children touching the same swings and jungle gyms, which typically aren't sanitize… [+6785 chars]
